LightningExitByPageMetrics.name: LightningExitByPageMetrics
LightningExitByPageMetrics.description: Represents frequency metrics about the standard pages within which users switched from Lightning Experience to Salesforce Classic.

MetricsDate.description: The date that the data was recorded.

PageName.description: The name of the page from which the user switched from Lightning Experience to Salesforce Classic.

RecordCount.description: The number of records per user and page.

UserId.description: UserId of the user who views page.
